verbose_text: Mitogen activated protein kinase (MAPK)/extracellular signal regulated protein kinase (ERK) is a key molecule in intracellular signal transducing pathways that transport extracellular stimuli from the cell surface to the nuclei.
evidence: Mitogen-activated protein kinase (MAPK)/extracellular signal-regulated protein kinase (ERK) is a key molecule in intracellular signal transducing pathways that transport extracellular stimuli from the cell surface
